title: 想要一個在1.8.1服可以飛的插件
author: yonnek
txt_content:
想要一個在1.8.1服可以壤op飛的插件

thankyou

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
Zombe 比較多人使用, 可以只裝它的 fly mod 就好...

[V1.8.1 & 1.9-pre] zombe's modpack (26 mods)
http://www.minecraftforum.net/to ... ods-v437-upd-18sep/
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/19090066/minecraft/readme.html

[FUN/MECH] VoxelAir v2.008 - Configurable Flight and Travel Powers
http://forums.bukkit.org/threads ... l-powers-1000.2213/
http://www.voxelwiki.com/minecraft/VoxelAir

Zombe 比較多人使用, 可以只裝它的 fly mod 就好...

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 well 于 2011-9-26 05:08 编辑 

官網... 
Current v5.0: Download link.
Current v4.37: Download link.
下載後, 裡頭就有啊... 
只裝 fly 就是你只要裝基本class, 再加上ui.class就好, 其他用不到的可以不放進jar裡

這有之前翻的 Zombe 安裝方法, 參考一下吧... 
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-7718-1-1.html

replies.author: yonnek
replies.txt_content:
well 发表于 2011-9-26 05:04 
官網... 
Current v5.0: Download link.
Current v4.37: Download link.
還是不懂...我下載了
Current v4.37: Download link.(for 1.8.1)
但是入面的"classes" 沒有 "ui.class" or "gs.class"
還有就是那些是基本的class???

我是用在bukkit server的 是整個file放到plugins就可以嗎??
thankyou

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
在文件夾 classes 裡頭... 

看英文說明... http://dl.dropbox.com/u/19090066/minecraft/readme.html
我那個翻譯是舊版的, 只供大略作法的參考

ui.class can be excluded if you don't want "fly" mod
ey.class can be excluded if you don't want "craft" mod
aew.class can be excluded if you don't want "sun" mod
aaw.class can be excluded if you don't want "boom" mod
ee.class can be excluded if you don't want "resize" mod
abs.class can be excluded if you don't want "furnace" mod
zk.class can be excluded if you don't want "dig" nor "build" mod

除了這幾個可裝可不裝之外, 其他 .class 都要裝啊... 


Q: How do i allow "fly" mod on my server?
A: Change the "allow-flight" option in your server.properties file to "true"

是裝進 minecraft.jar ...然後透過設置文件開啟功能...

replies.author: yonnek
replies.txt_content:

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
呃... 沒想到, 作者連說明網頁都懶得更新... 
看MOD內附的 readme.html
改名字了... sz.class

sz.class can be excluded if you don't want "fly" mod
em.class can be excluded if you don't want "craft" mod
acz.class can be excluded if you don't want "sun" mod
zf.class can be excluded if you don't want "boom" mod
dt.class can be excluded if you don't want "resize" mod
aaa.class can be excluded if you don't want "furnace" mod
xu.class can be excluded if you don't want "dig" nor "build" mod
